td.content: s:white male geographer aged 58 years presents with mild flatulence, Stomach. he has history of mild diarrhea. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 71 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
